title: 1043 Wim Hof: Master Your Breath to Live Happier & Defend Against Disease w/“The Iceman”
description:
“Stay simple. Stay humble. Change the world.”

On today's podcast, Lewis interviews Wim Hof, an extreme dutch athlete nicknamed “The Iceman” by breaking a number of records related to cold exposure including: climbing Mount Kilimanjaro in shorts, running a half marathon above the Arctic Circle barefoot, and standing in a container while covered with ice cubes for almost two hours! Wim is convinced that everyone can tap into their inner potential and has made it his mission to share what he’s learned with the rest of the world. Lewis and Wim have a wide-ranging conversation about the importance of mindful breathing, the power of food, the dangers of avoiding pain, techniques for handling stress, and so much more!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1043

Check out Wim Hof's website: https://www.wimhofmethod.com/

Read his new book: https://www.amazon.com/Wim-Hof-Method-Activate-Potential/dp/1683644093

The Wim Hof Experience: Mindset Training, Power Breathing, and Brotherhood: https://link.chtbl.com/910-pod

A Scientific Guide to Living Longer, Feeling Happier & Eating Healthier with Dr. Rhonda Patrick: https://link.chtbl.com/967-pod

The Science of Sleep for Ultimate Success with Shawn Stevenson: https://link.chtbl.com/896-pod
